page.title: 17RECREATION: ROOKLEY PARK
page.content: In Rookley Country Park there are lots of activities and things to do. There is a {cafe, adventure playground {and a lake. The Country Park is well situated on the main road from which it can be clearly seen. The manager said people came to the park mainly because the staff are so pleasant and there is something for the whole family to do. The land is used well here as it is too poor for farming. At the Park there are 33 ducks and a small pony. We also found out that the caravans and the Mallards Pub are an asset to the local inhabitants. There are motorbikes, army jeeps and an inflatable bouncing tiger. The prices range from 10p to 60p. There is an arcade in the cafe which has alot of machines. They often have car boot sales for charity. {Admission is free.
